      • addBtn

        public void addBtn()
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds the selected item to the order and updates the order_items table. Retrieves the current order_id and menu_item_id, then inserts the new order item.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
